title: The Best Coding Languages To Learn
summary: The best programming language to learn would be the one you like the most and can see yourself using. Java is one of the most popular programming languages in the world. Python is a very versatile language that can be used in many different fields. Swift is a great option if you are looking to get into app development or start a programming career. C++ is known for being very efficient, so it is great choice if you want to create advanced and resource-intensive programs. R or MATLAB are two other excellent options for programmers.
